title: Drawing, "First Valet Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: E.McK.K. 1925
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, lower left: Valet / No. I.
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: A man, standing frontally, with black chin-length hair, wearing a blue shirt and blue, black and green short pants; his head is turned to his right.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "First Valet Costume Design, for Henry IV", 1925.
1925. Brush and gouache, graphite on cream laid paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-176.
